module.name: interconnect_module_usage_view
module.keywords: module, electrical, electronic, electromechanical, interconnect, substrate, usage view, design, interface control definition

abstract.li: interconnect substrate features used for next level design;
interconnect substrate features that may be accessible from the exterior of the end item;
interconnect substrate terminals that are internally connected;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the interface definition of the interconnect substrate. This view may be used for the purpose of electrical and mechanical simulation and verification of the interconnect substrate performance when installed in the next level of assembly. Complex features including cavities and cutouts are predefined as well as industry standard edge treatments. The usage view may be treated as a requirement definition by a design organization with links established to relevant design details in an unpublished model maintained by that design organization.

inscope.li: interconnect substrate features used for next level design;
interconnect substrate features that may be accessible from the exterior of the end item;
interconnect substrate terminals that are internally connected;
items within the scope of application module Extended geometric tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1666;
items within the scope of application module Functional assignment to part, ISO/TS 10303-1674;
items within the scope of application module Functional usage view, ISO/TS 10303-1705.
